alert.note: Alert for Logan; Oklahoma; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:36PM CST until February 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet accumulations of up to a quarter of an inch and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...Logan, Payne and Oklahoma Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM Wednesday to 6 PM CST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 1 AM to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
